mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.member_code AS "memberCode", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.route_code AS "routeCode", (a.drawAmount + a.drawFee + a.tradeFee) AS "money", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.pt_serial_no AS "ptSerialNo", a.req_date AS "reqDate", a.resp_date AS "respDate", a.resp_type AS "respType", a.resp_code AS "respCode", a.resp_msg AS "respMsg", a.drawamount AS "drawamount", a.member_trade_rate AS "memberRate", a.drawfee AS "drawfee", a.drawRate AS "drawRate", a.tradefee AS "tradefee", a.settle_date AS "settleDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "member.name", b.name AS "memberName", b.mobile_phone AS "mobilePhone", o.name AS "office.name", o.parent_ids AS "office.parentIds", o.agt_grade AS "office.agtGrade", left(a.req_date,8) AS "txDate", right(a.req_date,6) AS "txTime", oi.PARENT_ID_LEVEL_1_NAME as "agentNameLevel1", a.money as "drawMoney", a.audit_status as "auditStatus", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.draw_type as "drawType", a.order_num_outer as "orderNumOuter", a.bank_name as "bankName", a.sub_name as "subName", a.sub_id as "subId", a.bank_account as "bankAccount", a.account_name as "accountName", a.cert_no as "certNo", a.tel as "tel", a.trade_money as "tradeMoney", a.settle_money as "settleMoney", a.drawed_money as "drawedMoney", a.can_draw_money as "canDrawMoney"

LEFT JOIN bu_member_info b ON b.id = a.member_id LEFT JOIN bu_epay_code c ON c.pay_code = b.pay_code LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = c.office_id left join v_agent_level_info oi on oi.id = c.office_id
mapper.insert: insert into bu_routeway_draw (member_id, member_code, merchant_code,route_code, member_trade_rate,draw_type,money, order_code,order_num_outer, pt_serial_no, req_date, resp_date, resp_type, resp_code, resp_msg, drawAmount, drawFee, tradeFee, settle_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag,audit_status,audit_by,audit_date, bank_name,sub_name,sub_id,bank_account,account_name,cert_no,tel ) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{routeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberTradeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{drawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderNumOuter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{drawfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bu_routeway_draw SET member_id = #{memberId}, member_code = #{memberCode}, merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, money = #{money}, order_code = #{orderCode}, pt_serial_no = #{ptSerialNo}, req_date = #{reqDate}, resp_date = #{respDate}, resp_type = #{respType}, resp_code = #{respCode}, resp_msg = #{respMsg}, drawamount = #{drawamount}, drawfee = #{drawfee}, tradefee = #{tradefee}, settle_date = #{settleDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE bu_routeway_draw SET audit_status = #{auditStatus}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_by = #{auditBy},
resp_type = #{respType},
resp_date = #{respDate},
req_date = #{reqDate},
trade_money = #{tradeMoney},
settle_money = #{settleMoney},
drawed_money = #{drawedMoney},
can_draw_money = #{canDrawMoney},
audit_date = sysdate() WHERE id = #{id}
